titleStmt.title: The speech of the right honourable Sir John Moore, Knight, at Guild-Hall, Septemb. 29th, 1681 when he was elected lord-mayor of London, together, with some passages of his deportment on the twenty-fourth of June, 1682, and before, in relation to the election of sheriffs for the said city, and county of Middlesex.
titleStmt.author: Moore, John, Sir, 1620-1702.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
